title: Rich Countries Offer Funds for Climate Loss and Damage After Decades of Resistance
description: Several European leaders at COP27 announced funds to help poor nations recover from loss and damage caused by climate change. The United States was silent.
dc:creator: David Gelles
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: Sandbags providing a barrier against rising seas in Funafuti, Tuvalu, in the South Pacific. Tuvalu’s prime minister, Kausea Natano, said on Tuesday that his nation was “the Pacific region’s champion of loss and damage.”
